effect.black-white: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.
effect.black-2-white-2: Does nothing. Wild battles end immediately.

short_effect.black-white: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Immediately ends wild battles. No effect otherwise.

flavor_text.black-white: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.
